column1: #Text=Prime Minister calls for suspension of Mugabe from African Union
#Text=Raila Odinga , the Kenyan Prime Minister , has said that Robert Mugabe should be suspended from the African Union until he allows free elections to take place in his country .
#Text=He has said that the AU " should suspend him [ Mugabe ] and send peace forces to Zimbabwe to ensure free and fair elections .

#Text=His appearance at the summit generated different reactions , from being hailed as a  hero " by the President of Gabon , to U.N. Deputy Secretary-General

column1: #Text=Asha-Rose Migiro 's remarks calling the situation in Zimbabwe " an extremely grave crisis " .
#Text=Mugabe , now in his sixth term as President , arrived in the Egyptian city of Sharm el-Sheikh on Monday .
#Text=Despite criticism from the African Union 's election observers , who said the election fell short of their standards , Mugabe was reportedly warmly received at the summit .
#Text=One delegate , speaking on condition of anonymity , said Mugabe was seen hugging other African leaders after the opening session .
#Text=Delegates at the convention discussed the elections , but largely avoided direct criticism of Mugabe or the government .

#Text=Jakaya Kekwete , the Tanzanian President chairing the summit , said , " We would like to congratulate the Zimbabwean people for their successes but we would also like to express our commiserations for their suffering .
